subject: Re: [junit] How to Overcome this error!!!!!!!!!!!
msgSnippet: I believe the awt Runner is no longer a part of the JUnit package!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! On Tue, Oct 21, 2008 at 11:53 AM, Varuna Seneviratna ...
messageBody:
I believe the awt Runner is no longer a part of the JUnit
package!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

On Tue, Oct 21, 2008 at 11:53 AM, Varuna Seneviratna
<varunaseneviratna@...> wrote:
> Hi All!
> I first created a directory as StudentInfo and went inside it, then I
> created the class
>
> public class StudentTest extends junit.framework.TestCase{
>>
>>
>>
>> }
>
> I issued the command
>
>> javac -classpath c:\junit\junit4.5\junit-4.5.jar StudentTest.java
>
> --
> The StudentTest class was successfully compiled and the StudentTest.class
> was created.
> Then to run the StudentTest class I issued the command
> java -cp .;c:\junit\junit4.5\junit-4.5.jar junit.awtui.TestRunner
> StudentTest
>
> which resulted in the error message
>
>> Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
>> junit/awtui/TestRunne
>> r
>> Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: junit.awtui.TestRunner
>> at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
>> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
>> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
>> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
>
> Please direct me to overcome this error!!!!!!!!!!!
>
> Varuna Seneviratna
